short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and download all the images on the page or download the image data in json format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find and download all the images on the page or download the image data in JSON format

üñºÔ∏è Get to know Image Downloader - your extension for downloading any images from any web page with the extensions: jpeg, jpg, webp, png, gif, svg, bmp, ico;

Features of the Image Downloader app:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Download all images at once or in bulk! You can select multiple images or all at once and upload them as a ZIP archive! üìÇ
2Ô∏è‚É£ Rename any image and upload it with the name. You no longer need to change the file name after uploading the image in File Explorer.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Upload image data as a JSON file for development purposes. Each entry in the JSON file contains: src, width, height, file size, image type, extension, name, alt attributes.
4Ô∏è‚É£ No copies. We will only analyze unique images, so duplicate images will not be displayed in the application.
5Ô∏è‚É£ No very small files or transparent files. We do not show images with a width and height of less than 10 pixels. 
6Ô∏è‚É£ Zoom the image, check the small size images.

Search for all images on the page and sources:
üîé Our image upload extension will find any image on the page and its associated sources.
1Ô∏è‚É£ Any CSS files and styles.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Any img and image tags
3Ô∏è‚É£ Even svg will be selected
4Ô∏è‚É£ Blob like and data like links
5Ô∏è‚É£ IFrames
6Ô∏è‚É£ Shadow DOM (with opened state)

Reasons to Pick Image Downloader:
1Ô∏è‚É£ User-Centric Design: Image Downloader boasts a simple, large and intuitive interface for image exploring and downloading.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Rename images on fly. Select image that you wants to download, input your expected image name into name field, and click download file button. Done!
3Ô∏è‚É£ Privacy First: Your site visits and image downloads are your own. We do not store your data.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Lots of filtering options: Search images by URL, name or alt. Filter them by width and height, layout, extension. Sort them by name, alt or file size.

Instructions for using Image Downloader:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Tap the Add to Chrome button to install the Image Downloader extension.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Launch the tab you wish to download images from.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Browse, filter, search or sort images or select all.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Change or input name in image name field.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Click Download file or download selected to download image(s).


‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions:
üìå Which images data can be included in JSON file?
Any image data that showed in extension, also this data can be filtered or sorted.

üìå Renaming the image does not work, the image is still loaded with the original name..
You may have an extension installed that overrides chrome functionality and conflicts with our extension, try disabling them and try again!

üìå Is there a limit to the number of images that can be downloadable at the same time?
There are no download restrictions, but there number of images placed on the page is limited to 1000.

üìå Why are N images displayed at the parsing stage, but as a result there are fewer than N images at the parsing stage.
Sometimes the extension finds URLs that do not exist, so we try to analyze them and, if it fails, remove them from the list;

üìå Can I upload images from other tabs?
We currently only support the current tab, but we are considering this as a feature in future updates.

Image Downloader extension requirements next permissions for it work:
1Ô∏è‚É£ scripting - needs for searching and parsing images links and Iframes/CSS sources on current page
2Ô∏è‚É£ downloads - needs for downloading, bulk downloading images or JSON file to PC
3Ô∏è‚É£ activeTab - needs to access current tab to get image links and sources.
